channel.title: Oh god please help me
channel.description: Right, now I have a server problem to go with my client problem, basically, I have the ports opened on Windows Firewall and on my router, I've got Path and CLASSPATH edited right in my computer's properties, I've got runserver up, and no one I know can connect, no-ip DUC is also up but I'm pulling my pubes out trying to fix thsi f*cking annoying problem, does anyone have any idea what could be wrong and how I can fix it? Please?

item.title: Oh god please help me
item.dc:creator: @aceman173 aceman173
item.description:
@aceman173 wrote:

That’s exactly what I have in there (with BenBoiScape though) and with the path and classpath they’re set to jdk1.6.0_06 which is the version I have.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 05:34:54 AM[/size][hr]Please someone?!

Read full topic

item.title: Oh god please help me
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

well make sure you have the classpath and path set on your version of java, also on run.bat in your source, right click > edit and replace with

@echo off
color 0a
title Metal-scape v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Metal-scape v1 can be changed to the name of your server is you wish…

Read full topic
